body:
annoyingly, `openblas` again stopped picking up fortran compiler for me on OSX, see the workaround in https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/846 

Tested on `darwin` (10.05.16):
- [x] `~openmp+shared%clang`
- [x] `~openmp~shared%clang`
- [x] `~openmp~shared%gcc`
- [x] `~openmp+shared%gcc`
- [x] `+openmp~shared%gcc`
- [x] `+openmp+shared%gcc`
title: openblas: fix a bug and cleanup the unit test
